column1: Little Goat Diner////but that didn't show at Little Goat. I got the highly rated French Toast Chicken per yelp and our waiter's recommendation that "It will blow your mind". Well
column2: it was pretty good. The egg was buried inside the french toast which was interesting. The fried chicken came in chopped up slices which was unexpected. Overall
column4: but it does not justify the $16 price tag. I felt like I was eating a fancy high quality McDonald's breakfast item. I'd rather go to Publican Quality Meat a block or two down the street.
